Subject: Delete Reports
Description:
Hi Support,

Good Day!

We would like to ask if there's a way we can delete old reports that is being captured by PingCastle Tool?

Thanks!
What_We_Know__c:
Customer wants to delete old reports that is being captured by PingCastle Tool.
What we can do with the Pro version is to archive, that keeps the data but does not allow to update it, and it claims back a license for the domain).
Also in Configuration > settings there is an option to delete old data.

When accessing the page shown in the screenshot you provided, the URL at the top should display the ID of the domain.

In this case, the domain ID should be "1." To proceed with deleting the domain, please navigate to the following URL:
http://localhost/Database/DeleteDomain/1
Next_Steps__c:
-Waiting for Joe to provide steps and screenshots to the customer after Vincent explained us how to accomplish what the customer need
- sent instructions to client
Solution_Comment__c:
When accessing the page shown in the screenshot you provided, the URL at the top should display the ID of the domain.

In this case, the domain ID should be "1." To proceed with deleting the domain, please navigate to the following URL:
http://localhost/Database/DeleteDomain/1
